snippet: Trafficking in Nepalese children was a problem before two earthquakes struck in April, but Unicef and the government fear the ensuing chaos may make a problem even worse.
abstract: Unicef's Nepal representative Tomoo Hozumi releases statement warning of possible spike in trafficking of children in wake of earthquakes in country.
lead_paragraph: Trafficking in Nepalese children was a problem before two earthquakes struck in April, but Unicef and the government fear the ensuing chaos may make a problem even worse.

headline.main: Unicef Fears Surge in Child Trafficking After Nepal Quakes
headline.print_headline: Unicef Fears Surge in Child Trafficking After Nepal Quakes
